name: Committed Burst Size (Ingress)
title: CBS-I
definition: Identifies the Bandwidth Profile parameter that limits the maximum number of bytes available for a burst of Service Frames sent at the UNI/ENNI that will be delivered by the service provider based on the level of service performance.

validEntry.description: Maximum Committed Burst Size Value (numeric value

usageNotes: Optional when the associated LREF field is populated and the LOSACT field is not “D”, otherwise prohibited.
fieldNotes: Level of service performance will be identified in either the SPEC field or the LOS field.
